pkgmetadata.longdescription: P-Model // Implements the P-model (Stocker et al., 2019 doi:10.5194/gmd-2019-200), predicting acclimated parameters of the enzyme kinetics of C3 photosynthesis, assimilation, and dark respiration rates as a function of the environment (temperature, CO2, vapour pressure deficit, light, atmospheric pressure).
